title: Mini-Ep 247: A Face Like Butter
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 247: A Face Like Butter
itunes:subtitle: Kate obsesses over another French skincare product and Doree enjoys the nostalgia of printed photos. Then, they hear from listeners about a wildly impressive product, mature makeup for special occasions, and putting the whole “biweekly thing” to rest....
description:
Kate obsesses over another French skincare product and Doree enjoys the nostalgia of printed photos. Then, they hear from listeners about a wildly impressive product, mature makeup for special occasions, and putting the whole “biweekly thing” to rest.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
